## [Crump Lab Statistics for Undergrads in Psychology Textbook](https://github.com/CrumpLab/statistics)

**What is this?**

This is a FREE Statistics for Undergrads in Psychology Textbook, on a creative commons license.
Source code for everything available in the respective repos.

1.  Web-book is here: <https://crumplab.github.io/statistics/>
2.  Lab manual is here: <https://crumplab.github.io/statisticsLab/>
3.  Course website is here: <https://crumplab.github.io/psyc3400/>
